This is a disease she fought against for many years but still she was always struggling together with her children to get ahead since their father abandoned them when they were children. Juan Carlos struggles daily and values the sacrifice his mother made for his sisters and for himself. He is asking for funds to buy a truckload of soy husks which is the feed for his cattle so that he can generate higher income and produce more milk. He currently extracts 150 liters of milk daily which he delivers to his mother-in-law to make “quesillo” (small fresh farm cheese popular in the Cochabamba valley.) Juan Carlos wants a better future for his son. This is why he works from very early in the morning and does other farming chores. He and his wife want to get married in the not too distant future and work together to help their son study a professional career and have a better future than he has had.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy soy based cattle feed.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter, de 29 años, vive en casa de sus padres en compañía de ellos y de sus hermanos, todos juntos habitan en una modesta vivienda de material noble ubicada en un populoso barrio al norte de la ciudad. Este emprendedor joven se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi, durante el día, dice que escogió este horario porque trabajar en la noche es más peligroso. Aunque no tiene hijos aún se esfuerza a diario, para ayudar en algo a sus padres en los constantes gastos del hogar, y también para terminar con la construcción de su casa. Trabaja con clientes fijos y nuevos, por rutas cortas, ya que sabe que así se obtiene mayores ganancias, y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es compartir experiencias con sus ocasionales pasajeros, además se distrae bastante viendo las calles y las personas. Tiene grandes planes por concretar, uno de ellos es, comprar un auto para rentarlo, de esta manera espera obtener mejores ganancias. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente para no defraudar a todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Walter tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en el mantenimiento mecánico de su auto, ya que lo requiere con urgencia para poder trabajar tranquilamente.
texts.en:
Walter, 29, lives with his parents and siblings in their house which is a modest house made from substantial materials located in a crowded neighborhood in the north part of the city. This enterprising young man provides taxi services during the day. He says he selected this work schedule because working at night is more dangerous. Although he doesn’t have any children he works hard daily to help his parents with the constant household expenses and to finish building their house. He works with both new and regular customers on short routes because that means higher profits. What he likes best about his work is sharing experiences with his passengers and he enjoys looking at the streets and the people. He has a lot of plans in the works. One of them is to buy a car to lease it out thereby earning better profits. This is his 2nd loan with MFP and he promises to repay punctually so as not to disappoint all the people that made the loan possible which will allow him to keep working in search of progress. Walter will use the funds for vehicle maintenance and repair because it has some urgent work that needs to be done in order to be able to work worry-free.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La Señora Sabina es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Perlas II”, ubicado en la provincia D. Huancané y departamento D. Puno, tiene 48 años D. edad, D. estado civil  casada y tiene  05 hijo (01 independiente), la señora estudió  hasta 5to D. primaria.

La señora Sabina esta trabajando con Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 8 meses como grupo mientras tanto y ahora como Banco Comunal,  nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, pudo incrementar su capital para su negocio D.  venta D. artefactos electrodomésticos.

Con este crédito D. S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, podrá hacer crecer más en su negocio D. venta D. artefactos.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener  casas y una tienda propia.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las reuniones con las socias y las charlas que se dan.
texts.en:
Sabina is a member of the community bank "The Pearls II". It is located in the province of Huancane, Puno. She is 48 years old, she is married, and she has 5 children (one is independent). She has a graD. 5 education. Sabina has been a member of the Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) movement for the past 8 months, previously as a group member and now as a member of the community bank. With her first loan of 300 nuevos soles she managed to increase her capital and supplement her hardware store business. With this new loan in the amount of 800 nuevos soles she will be able to make her business grow. Her dreams for the future incluD. having a home and her own store. She most enjoys the gatherings in her community bank and the talks are given at their meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase hardware products.

loans.name: Gueni

texts.es:
La Señorita Gueni es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Perlas II”,  ubicado en la provincia de Huancané  y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 años de edad, de estado civil  soltera, no  tiene  hijos. Gueni estudió   educación superior pero no lo culminó.

La señorita Gueni esta trabajando con Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses como grupo mientras tanto y ahora como Banco Comunal,  nos cuenta que con el primer préstamo solicitado de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, el cual permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de  venta de Artefactos electrodomésticos. 

En la actualidad la señorita  solicitará un nuevo  crédito de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitirá  incrementar el capital de su negocio y aumentar la mercadería del negocio. 

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener una micro empresa.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la organización de la Institución.
Notese en la foto junto a uno de sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Gueni is a member of the community bank "The Pearls II". It is located in the province of Huancane, Puno. She is 19 years old, she is single, and she has no children. She started college courses but she never completed her diploma. Gueni has been a member of the Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) movement for the past 8 months, first as a group member and now as part of the community bank. The first loan she requested of 500 nuevos soles allowed her to supplement her business' working capital, selling household products. She requests a new loan in the amount of 800 nuevos soles, funds that will permit her to supplement her business and increase the merchandise she has in stock. Her dream for the future is to have a small business. What she most likes about the community bank is the orderliness and organization of the institution. (Note: she is pictured here together with her siblings).

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase household products.
